mapper.select: SELECT biz_dt as bizDt, fundaccount as funaccount, asset_allocation as assetllocation,operate as operate,stock_selection as stockSelection ,stability as stability,market_timing as marketTiming,risk_control as riskControl FROM swcompositescore WHERE fundaccount=#{account}
SELECT BIZ_DT as day, today_profit_rate as porfitToday, TODAY_PROFIT as profitMoney FROM swfundAssetdaily WHERE FUND_ACCOUNT= #{0} and BIZ_DT >= #{1} and BIZ_DT <= #{2} order by BIZ_DT
SELECT biz_dt as day, profit_rate as porfitToday FROM sweliteperformance WHERE biz_dt >= #{0} and biz_dt <= #{1} order by BIZ_DT

SELECT SEC_NAME as stockName,PERIOD_HOLDER_DAYS as holdDays,CURRENT_BALANCE as currentState,PERIOD_PROFIT as profitMoney FROM swstockmonth WHERE FUND_ACCOUNT = #{0} AND MONEY_TYPE = 0 and year_mth = #{1} order by PERIOD_PROFIT DESC
